name: Impossible Coconut Pie
description: A self-crusting coconut pie that creates its own crust as it bakes.
ingredients: 1 stick unsalted butter, melted, plus more for greasing
instructions: Preheat oven to 350Â°F. Butter two pie pans.
In a large bowl, whisk melted butter with sugar.
Stir in flour, coconut and milk. Add eggs and beat until smooth.
Bake in lower 1/3 of oven for about 1 hour until pies are firm to the touch and golden.
Transfer pies to a rack and cool completely before serving.
notes: Pies can be refrigerated overnight. Return them to room temperature before serving.
